data.name: The Legend of Capa Negra
data.detailed_description:
"The Legend of Capa Negra" is a souls-like Action-RPG set in a medieval dark fantasy world.

As a new member of the Rebel Faction, your first mission is to travel to a small village to meet your contact, find your way trough dangerous landscapes and join the war against the King!

• Skill-based combat system with dozens of spectacular execution moves

• Complete quests, fight and trade

• Free Navigation, choose your path and use the information gathered from NPC's to find your way

• Discover hidden areas, secret passages, and more mysteries in a handcrafted world

• Play 6 different classes

• Swords, spears, bows, axes, maces - an arsenal of weapons and armors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.66 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200, 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX 670 or NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX 1050 / AMD® Radeon™ HD 7950 or AMD® Radeon™ R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300, 2.8 GHz / AMD FX-6300, 3.5GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX 780 or NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX 1060-6GB / AMD® Radeon™ R9 290 or RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
